OPERATION M1 M2 M3 M4 M5 SV ;

DATA MERGE M1 ;
POLYGON 0 0 100 0 100 100 0 100 0 0 ;
POLYGON 100 0 200 0 200 100 100 100 100 0 ;
POLYGON 50 50 54 50 54 54 52 54 52 52 50 52 50 50 ;
POLYGON 70 70 80 70 90 70 90 90 75 90 70 90 70 70 ;
POLYGON 125 50 175 50 175 175 125 175 125 50 ;
END DATA

DATA MERGE M2 ;
POLYGON 0 100 200 100 200 200 0 200 0 100 ;
POLYGON 0 150 50 150 50 -50 0 -50 0 150 ;
END DATA

DATA MERGE M3 ;
POLYGON 0 100 200 100 200 200 0 200 0 100 ;
POLYGON 500 500 600 500 600 800 700 800 700 700 500 700 500 500 ;
END DATA

DATA MERGE M4 ;
POLYGON 0 100 200 100 200 200 0 200 0 100 ;
POLYGON 500 5000 600 5000 600 800 700 800 700 700 500 700 500 5000 ;
END DATA

DATA MERGE M5 ;
POLYGON 0 0 100 0 100 100 0 100 0 0 ;
POLYGON 0 0 100 0 100 100 0 100 0 0 ;
POLYGON 0 0 1000 0 1000 1000 0 1000 0 0 ;
END DATA
